:::{#about}

He is an Assistant Professor at the Department of Industrial Engineering of the University of Trento. Previously, he worked as an R&D Engineer at Centro Ricerche Fiat, Orbassano, and as a Postdoctoral researcher with FBK research institute, Trento. His research interests include data-driven modeling, dynamics, and model-based design for vehicular and energy systems.
